data.description: <div><div><p><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">At </span><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.tranetechnologies.com"><a target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Trane Technologies<sup>TM</sup></span></a></a><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">  and through our businesses including </span><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.trane.com"><a target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Trane<sup>®</sup></span></a></a><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> and </span><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.Thermoking.com"><a target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Thermo King<sup>®</sup></span></a></a><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">, we create innovative climate solutions for buildings, homes, and transportation that challenge what’s possible for a sustainable world. We're a team that dares to look at the world's challenges and see impactful possibilities. We believe in a better future when we uplift others and enable our people to thrive at work and at home. We boldly go.</span></p><p><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;"><strong><u>JOB DESCRIPTION:</u></strong><o:p></o:p></span></p><p><span style="color:black;font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">This person will participate in our company’s product development process through maintaining and improving software tools used by our subject matter experts (SME) and product support team. This opportunity will provide exposure to a variety of practical assignments, which could include new engineering software development, maintenance of existing software tools, and analytics/data science. This position is flexible with the ability to shift the core roles and responsibilities based on skills that share your same interests. This internship requires year-round availability while attending school full time. Preferred candidates would have completed their sophomore year with at least two school years remaining. Hours are flexible, but applicants must be able to work a minimum of 15 hours a week during the school year and 40 hours per week during the summer and breaks.<o:p></o:p></span></p><p><span style="color:black;font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;"><o:p> </o:p></span></p><p><span style="color:#6400ff;font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:10.0pt;"><span class="normaltextrun" style="mso-fareast-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;"><strong>Where is the work:</strong> </span></span><span style="color:black;font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:10.0pt;"><span style="mso-fareast-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p><p><span style="color:black;font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:10.0pt;"><span style="mso-fareast-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;">This position has been designated as a Hybrid work schedule with work performed onsite 3 days each week.  <o:p></o:p></span></span></p><p><span style="color:black;font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;"><strong><u>KEY COMPETENCIES:<o:p></o:p></u></strong></span></p><ul style="margin-top:0in;" type="disc"><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Maintain and document engineering software tools for product development.<o:p></o:p></span></li><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Work with team members in agile/scrum process to track tasks.<o:p></o:p></span></li><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Plan and develop technology upgrades for engineering software tools.<o:p></o:p></span></li></ul><p><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;"><o:p> </o:p></span></p><p><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;"><strong><u>PHYSICAL EFFORT:</u></strong><u><o:p></o:p></u></span></p><ul style="margin-top:0in;" type="disc"><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Typical office environment spending most of their time using computers.<span style="mso-spacerun:yes;">  </span>Accommodations will be evaluated where needed.<o:p></o:p></span></li></ul><p><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;"><o:p> </o:p></span></p><p><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;"><strong><u>ADDITIONAL</u></strong><u> </u><strong><u>REQUIREMENTS:</u></strong><u><o:p></o:p></u></span></p><ul style="margin-top:0in;" type="disc"><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Sophomore standing or above in Computer Science or Software Engineering.<o:p></o:p></span></li><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Overall GPA 3.0 or above.<o:p></o:p></span></li><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Demonstrated collaboration/leadership skills such as school club officer, team captain, resident advisor, or leader of a service organization.<o:p></o:p></span></li><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Resiliency and ability to adapt quickly.<o:p></o:p></span></li><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Passion for solving problems with data and technology.<o:p></o:p></span></li><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Experience in UI development with Windows Forms a plus.<o:p></o:p></span></li><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Experience with .NET, Fortran, VB, or C# a plus.<o:p></o:p></span></li><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Passion for continuous learning and willingness to adapt to changing environments.<o:p></o:p></span></li><li class="MsoNormal" style="mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:11.0pt;">Experience with developing, maintaining, and documenting CI/CD pipelines is a plus.<o:p></o:p></span></li></ul><p style="margin-left:0in;"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:10.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin-left:0in;"><span
